original_title: Roy Jones Jr. vs. Virgil Hill
overview: Roy Jones came into this fight as a 6/1 favorite and justified those odds when he KO'd former light-heavyweight champion Virgil Hill with a right hand shot to the body at 1.10 of the 4th round to win by KO victory.Jones landed 34 of 69 power punches (49%) and Hill landed 11 of 30 (37%). The KO was named The Ring Knockout of the Year.
title: Roy Jones Jr. vs. Virgil Hill
